message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations. Given its unique features and potential impact, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $2000000. This is a limited-time offer, and I am confident it will provide substantial value to your company.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but given my budget constraints, I would like to propose a more feasible price of $1500000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
